name: Alanna
review: We joined this church in 2013 (6 years now) and have been blessed to have pastors preach the gospel. This church is blessed with many wonderful families and little children. A great place to gather and worship as one body whether you are new to the city, a student, a young family, empty-nesters or just passing through.

name: Mark Lowe
review: Jeff Hamn is a true teacher of the Bible. Go and be blessed by God's word. Learn the only truths worth hearing or knowing at this church. The Gospel is what your soul is thirsty; go to this place and you will be filled.

name: Corey Rollison
review: We love this church! Been there over a decade and the community is wonderful. Have lots of small groups around the city!
